{{Description|Though it lies deep underground, the strong winds filled every corridor of the ruin. Don't be discouraged! Find the treasure deep within the ruin!|Explore: Windy Cliff}}
'''Temple of the Falcon''' is a domain entrance. It contains the [[One-Time Domain]] '''Explore: Windy Cliff''' and two story domains.
